import React, { useReducer, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Post, User } from '../api/types' const PostItem = (props: Post) => { const [author, setAuthor] = useState(null) return (

{props.title}

{props.body}
{author && (
{author ? author.name : 'not defined'}
)}
) } export default PostItem
